short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Identify opportunities, connect with customers, and sell smarter.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create and update contacts in Gmail, and see them in Manufabric.  Create Contacts in Manufabric and see then in Gmail. Automate Manufabric data entry.

Quickly sync contacts and meetings between Manufabric and Gmail contacts and calendar. 

* Automate Manufabric data-entry *

The Inbox app enables automatic integrations for calendar and contacts. 

You must be a current subscriber to Manufabric, the ultimate efficiency tool for independent manufacturers reps.
